title: Interpretation of a dream about losing a daughter in a dream and its consequences

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about losing a daughter in a dream: The dream is considered a group of events that pass quickly in a person’s sleep, and most dreams revolve around the events that the person experienced at the time or what he was thinking about. There are types of dreams that have no explanation called false dreams, and also disturbing dreams or nightmares. That comes from Satan, and there is a vision that is a sign from God - Glory be to Him - to man, so what is the interpretation of the dream of losing a daughter in a dream.Interpretation of the dream of losing my married daughterChildren are considered an adornment of this earthly life, so a person seeks to raise his children in the right way, guide them on the right path and keep them away from A mistake, and a mother seeing that her daughter is lost in a dream is evidence of this. He lives in confusion regarding decision making: Problems occur in a married woman’s life when she sees in a dream that her daughter is lost and has not been found. Also, the illness of a family member will disappear, when a woman sees that she has found her missing daughter in her dream. The woman is also exposed to many pressures. In her life, when she sees in her dream that her daughter is missing and searches for her. These fears also disappear if this woman dreams that she has found her missing daughter. In addition, a divorced woman’s circumstances change for the better when she sees that she has found her daughter who disappeared during her sleep. Likewise, the daughter takes a path An evil sign leads her to a dead end when she sees her daughter leaving and then disappearing. A pregnant woman is also exposed to severe psychological exhaustion due to her pregnancy when she sees her daughter disappearing in a dream. In addition, the mother is afraid and fears that her daughter will divorce her when she gets married, when she sees that her daughter got lost during her sleep. See also : Interpretation of dreams to see watermelon in a dream for single and married women. Interpretation of dreams that I lost my daughter and found her. Children do not feel their fathers’ fear for them, their constant anxiety and fear, and seeing this dream indicates that this woman is going through problems and then this problem is solved and the woman returns to her normal life: One of the family members is suffering from He falls ill and then recovers from it and sees his daughter lost and then finds her in a dream. The man also lives in tension and anxiety when he sees his daughter lost in the dream, and then all this anxiety disappears when he sees that he has found her. Likewise, a married woman overcomes the difficulties she faces when she sees in her dream that she has found Her missing daughter. Moreover, a father’s sorrows and problems end when he dreams that he has found his missing daughter. Likewise, a divorced woman obtains all her rights when she dreams that her ex-husband finds her missing daughter and returns her to her. The man also returns to the job he left after he dreamed that he found his missing daughter Moreover, the ordeal he was experiencing ends, as he saw his missing daughter in his sleep. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the color red in a dream and its most important indicators. Interpretation of losing a grandson in a dream. Seeing the loss of a grandson is like losing a daughter, as it shows the loss and pain that a person experiences, and sees Many believe that the love of a grandson is no less than the love of a son or daughter, so seeing this in a dream does not seem to be the same

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing one’s wife divorcing in a dream

preview.html: Divorcing a woman in a dream is one of the dreams that surprises a person and he may think that it indicates evil and hatred, but does it carry goodness? Only in this article will we learn about the most accurate interpretations formulated by leading interpreters and scholars, and they tried to bring out a strong and correct meaning in interpreting the dream of divorce, and among these scholars are Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others. Divorcing a woman in a dream. Dream books, in interpreting a dream about divorcing a wife, state: Hearing of one’s wife’s divorce in a dream does not necessarily mean separation. He will be healed, God willing, and if the dreamer dreams that he divorces his wife while he is free, then it expresses a fundamental change in his life that may separate him from his country, or rise to his place between the two parties. Or things get bad. This depends on his condition. Al-Nabulsi says that seeing a person’s sadness in a dream when he divorces his wife indicates his separation from his beloved or his loss of something that he loves deeply, and in both cases he must be patient and consider his affairs. God, and sometimes it symbolizes the loss of the job he is currently working in, and therefore he has to look for another source of livelihood through which he can live his days, and when the dreamer sees his divorce from his wife in a dream, it is a sign of stumbling on the path of his life. Divorcing his wife in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentions that Seeing a divorced wife in a dream is a sign that she is losing something whose importance she does not realize until she loses it. The dreamer is sick and her separation in the dream indicates that her death is near and she will be among the dead, so it is preferable for him to take care of her in her last days. In the event that the wife’s divorce is completed in the dream, but the divorce is later rejected, this indicates correcting what was lost in his life, as if he was in a state of neglect. This is a sign of his repentance and repentance. Returning to the path of truth.. In the coming period, he may return to his family home, and if one sees another’s wife divorcing in a dream, this proves that some negative things have occurred in his life. Through Google, you can join us on a site about the secrets of dream interpretation, and you will find everything you are looking for. Divorce. A pregnant woman in a dream: When the dreamer sees his wife asking him for a divorce while she is pregnant, this expresses the good things that will happen in his life, in addition to the good news that a boy will be born in reality and that he will change from one state. To other problems, but he will be able to get over them after a long time. The interpretation of a dream that a pregnant woman divorces is a sign of the dreamer’s erratic actions and he should be more careful about his actions. The difficult situation he fell into. Asking for a divorce from his wife in a dream. When a man dreams of his wife asking for a divorce in a dream, this indicates his attachment to temptations and desires without regard to religious morals and the laws of God, and his actions are more so as not to oppress her with it, and if a woman asks for a divorce in a dream and sees her happiness It proves her need for tenderness and love. If one sees his wife wanting to divorce him in a dream, but in reality he is single, this expresses his separation from something he loves deeply and should not despair as goodness is always what God has chosen. His family. A husband divorces his wife in a dream. When a man sees his divorce from his wife in a dream

title: Learn the interpretation of seeing a gun in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretations and interpretations of seeing a gun in a dreamIt is known that a gun is often used to restore rights to its owners and get rid of problems and difficulties. Seeing a gun in a dream means support and help from someone. Whoever sees himself carrying a gun, this shows strength, immunity, and superiority in some matters of life. Interpretation Dream of a Weapon: Seeing a gun in a dream indicates the high status of the dreamer, his superiority, and his freedom from the problems he faces and the worries that bother him. Seeing a weapon indicates the strength and salvation of the dreamer from disasters. The gun indicates helping some people and standing by him in the vision. If someone sees that he is able to use A weapon and he knows how to handle it well, this indicates that he achieved what he wanted. If the dreamer is traveling to a far place, this means that he will return to his home and family safely. What is the interpretation of a gun in Ibn Sirin’s dream? If one sees himself being killed with a gun in a dream This indicates that this person is weak and cannot solve all his problems alone. When a person sees in his dream a group of men and people carrying guns and he does not know them, this indicates that person’s fear and fear of being robbed. You still do not find an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. A gun in a single woman’s dream. If a girl sees a gun in her dream, this indicates that girl’s bad luck and faltering movements, and that she suffers a lot in her life. If the girl is engaged, then this fiancé is very bad and will harm her in her life and will not be fulfilled. This engagement. If an unmarried woman encounters thieves and she uses a gun to protect herself, this indicates victory over something and that she got what she wanted. Interpretation of seeing a gun in a dream If a man sees a gun in his dream, this indicates a disabled wife or wife. But if he sees A person himself carries a gun, this shows his control over all matters, his knowledge of how to manage all his actions and his superiority in them. If a man dreams that he has a white gun or a revolver, this indicates that this person will obtain large sums of money. For a man to see in his dream that he went to sell a gun, this means It indicates that that man will die soon. If the man is armed and those around him are unarmed, this indicates his promotion and arrival to a new and good position. A woman carrying a gun also indicates that her child will be a boy, not a girl. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is carrying a gun , this means that the date of birth is approaching. Interpretation of shooting from a gun in a dream When a man sees a gun shooting from behind, this indicates the machinations of his enemies. If the dreamer shoots with a gun, this means that he has committed sins and pursued his lust. When you see someone shooting with a gun This indicates slander of chaste women and his attempt to defame a woman. This also indicates anger and rebellion against a complicated situation that a person is going through or rebellion against a situation occurring within the viewer. If someone is seen shooting the dreamer, this means that the dreamer will resort to these people in reality. But if the person sees himself divorced

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing goats in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing goats in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi: Seeing goats in a dream indicates a calm, safe and stable life and the disappearance of problems and worries. Seeing a herd of goats means good behavior, and goats are animals that feed on grasses and clover, and goat meat is one of the most delicious types of meat and can be eaten with vegetables, as it is delicious for barbecuing and has many benefits. We will tell you the most important interpretation of the dream of seeing goats in a dream. Follow us. Dream of seeing goats by Ibn Sirin. Seeing goats in high mountains indicates the dreamer’s ambition. Seeing goats in the plains is a sign of abundant life and the benevolence of the dreamer. Seeing a goat climbing a tree means goodness and strength. Drinking goat’s milk in The dream is an indication of making a living on a large scale. Seeing a herd of goats walking quietly in the form of a herd, this indicates stability in life. Whoever dreams of sitting with a goat herder, this indicates the good level he will obtain. Dream of seeing goats for Nabulsi If you see a small goat covered With hair, this indicates the presence of a good woman in the fortuneteller’s life. Whoever dreams that he is breastfeeding a goat and has long hair, this indicates that the dreamer will marry a beautiful woman. A dream of seeing goats is for single people. Goats in a girl’s dream are a sign of kindness and a welcome vision for her. Slaughtering a goat in a girl’s dream For an unmarried woman, it is a sign of a short marriage. Seeing a goat being fed in dreams is a sign of achieving goals and desires. Cooking a goat in a dream is a sign of kindness and freedom from worries and problems. Seeing a small goat is a good and promising vision. Seeing a small goat is a good vision for a married and pregnant woman. Seeing a small goat for a married woman indicates pregnancy soon. Seeing a pregnant goat indicates easy childbirth and the birth of a beautiful female. Seeing a goat also indicates success and excellence for a single person. To achieve goals and ambitions in life. It also indicates good luck in work and marriage. Seeing a white goat in... The dream of an unmarried girl indicates a lot of good news. In her academic or professional life and in her successful social relationships. It also indicates a romantic relationship that ends in a happy marriage. This foretells in her dream that a religious and virtuous man will propose to her. If an unmarried woman sees a white goat in her dream, this It means that she is a woman. Her marriage to a man with high religious morals. Seeing a goat in an unmarried woman’s dream also means happy news and circumstances. A dream to see a goat for a man. Black goats in a man’s dream indicate the presence of a strong woman in his life. Buying a goat in a man’s dream is a sign of news The pleasant one. A goat in a man’s dream indicates the benefit and goodness that he will receive. A white goat in a dream indicates that this person has a good personality and a good heart. Seeing a goat hunter in a dream means that the dreamer wants a new friend. Dreaming of seeing goats for a married womanIf a married woman sees That a goat gives birth in a dream, this indicates pregnancy in the near future. Slaughtering or cooking a goat in a married woman’s dream is a sign of good news. A goat cooked in the dream indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing black lines on the stomach in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing black lines on the stomach in a dream. Many ambiguous details appear in the dream and are given interpretations that are far from their meaning in real life, based on the conclusions of scientists, that is, the science of dream interpretation is probabilistic. Science and human reasoning, therefore carry the possibility of being right or wrong. There is nothing to confirm this even if there are many interpretations of a particular dream. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing black lines on the stomach in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the stomach in a dream: This dream can indicate imprisonment, danger, childbirth, illness, friendship, and it can indicate scandal or separation. If the fortuneteller is a woman and she is pregnant, the pregnancy will come out of her. But if a person walks in a dream on his stomach, then he needs others and seeks to gain their love and satisfy his hunger. The belly is the belly of the valley. Perhaps the abdomen indicates what the thigh of the bed or the dome suggests, and it may be a reference to travel or imprisonment. Whoever dreams that his stomach has pus or boils, this indicates that he will not eat or sleep in bed. It is hypocrisy, but if his stomach is narrow, his money or his son will decrease. Whoever sees that his stomach is large will get a lot of money or children. Interpretation of a dream about seeing black lines on the stomach in a dream: Whoever sees that his stomach is empty, or has lost his money or children, it is said: free from suspicion, It may be a sign of the ship. Whoever sees in his dream that his stomach has black lines or that his stomach is torn and his intestines are coming out, his ship will be cut off. Whoever sees in his dream that his house has been demolished, and he suffers from a physical illness or pain in his stomach, he will die. Confinement: The stomach is the home and the animal, the liver is the boy, and the heart is also. The lung is the servant or daughter, the stomach is the bag and the throat is the release. Whoever sees in German that he takes up the construction of his house and closes it on the highest possible level, builds a high house, and if a man’s stomach is his ship, and his head is his heart, his neck, his mast, and the sides of the walls. Interpretation of a dream about seeing black lines On the stomach in a dream: The ruler’s vision of the stomach in a dream is a sign of his wealth, and he may give it up or abandon the gifts of this world and cling to the afterlife and seek to preserve the dignity of the region he rules. - Referring to the asceticism of orphans’ wealth, which is a clear matter that should not be overlooked because it has many consequences in his life, and it may foretell his secret being revealed to people and the loss of his reputation. The belly can indicate a clan or family, and entering it is a sign of travel and movement from one place to another. The belly can indicate the invalidity of religion, hatred, hypocrisy, or hypocrisy. If the belly size is small, he will lose a lot of money or may harm his children. A man's stomach in a dream may be a sign of an accident to his ship, if he has one or it is stolen. In general, seeing the abdomen in a dream or seeing black lines in the abdomen area is a warning to be careful and pay attention to others. It interprets travel, a journey, waiting for something, or observing one’s actions. Dreams are a reflection of fixed thoughts and feelings, which is information that the dreamer carries in his mind and how He sees the thing

title: Interpretation of a dream about dogs inside the house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about dogs inside the house in a dream. If you are looking for an interpretation of a dream about dogs inside the house in a dream, it is one of the interpretations that some people want to know the meaning of this dream, and if it is one of the signs of good and evil, and in the reality of the dream and its interpretation is good, it is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about dogs Inside the house in a dream: If you see a group of dogs around the house, this may indicate evil that may be approaching the people of the house and they must be prevented. A dream about the presence of ugly dogs inside the house in a dream may indicate that there are people who are not well in their lives at that time and they must ask God for help. Anyone who dreams that a dog was inside the house in a dream may indicate changes occurring among the people of the house, so he must ask God for help. If you see dogs inside the house in a dream, this may indicate the presence of a corrupt person and you must stay away from him, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about resistance. Dogs in a dream Seeing a dog resisting in a dream can indicate the struggle against the problem that the dreamer is in on those days, and God knows best. In the event that a person sees that he is resisting dogs, this may indicate his ability to achieve goals and ambitions during those days. If you see a dog attacking A person while doing this, it may indicate good changes occurring in his life during this time. If one sees a dog resisting in a dream, this may indicate good changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about dogs running after me in A person who dreams that dogs are chasing and attacking him can indicate the presence of an actor trying to destroy his reputation. A dream about dogs chasing a visionary in a dream can indicate that a problem remains that the owner of the vision was big. If one sees that dogs are jumping on him, this may indicate that his enemies They surround him, and he must ask God for help. In the event that you see dogs chasing a person in a dream, this may be an indication of feeling sad and sad at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a dog in a dream: Slaughtering a dog and eating its meat may indicate that there are many... Goals that one would like to achieve. If a person sees in his dream that he is slaughtering a dog, this may indicate that he has overcome a major problem that he was facing at that time. In the event that a person sees that he is slaughtering a dog in a dream, this may be a sign of changes occurring Positiveness in the dreamer’s life during this period. Whoever sees in his dream that he is slaughtering a dog in a dream, it may indicate hearing good news in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about black dogs attacking me in a dream Seeing a black dog attacking in a dream could mean victory over enemies. If someone sees that he is running away from a black dog attack in a dream, this may indicate the achievements he has achieved in his life during this period. Being attacked by a black dog in a dream could indicate that the person feels fear at that time, and God knows best. Everyone who sees In his dream that he is being attacked by black dogs, this may indicate stumbles that occurred in his life in those days, and God knows best. Interpret

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman getting married again?

preview.html: Interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream of marrying again: Marriage is one of the things that fills the heart and soul with joy and happiness. As for seeing a divorced woman getting married again in a dream, are its connotations good or are there other elements behind this dream, and in the following lines we will explain all the details so that the sleeper can be reassured. Read with us about to learn everything that is new. Interpretation of a dream about divorce through marriage Repeatedly Seeing a woman getting married for the first time The second dream in a dream indicates the positive changes that will happen to her in the next period of her life as compensation for what happened to her in the previous period. She will marry a second time, which will lead her to get rid of the obstacles and crises that hinder her work due to unfair competition and hatred of her high status. Seeing a woman marrying her father Again in her dream, it indicates her anxiety about the next stage and her unknown future, her desire to return to the past of her youth and live quietly with her family, and the woman’s refusal to marry in her vision. A respectable man symbolizes the difficult financial situation that he will suffer from in the coming days. Interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream of marriage by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a divorced woman marrying her ex-husband in a dream symbolizes the affection and tenderness that she had experienced with him in the previous period, and the woman’s marriage for the second time in the dream indicates On her journey. To work abroad and her desire to achieve a set of successes that will make her stand out in her field and make her country proud of everything related to her. Watching a woman getting married for the second time in a dream shows her control over deceivers and envious people around her and victory over them, and the dreamer’s marriage for the second time leads to the happy news that she will learn from someone close. From her and happiness, happiness and joy will dominate her heart in the very near future. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman marrying someone she knows. Vision A divorced woman who marries a second time to someone she knows in a dream means that she will receive a large inheritance that was stolen from her for a long time by force, and her life will change to prosperity, calm, stability and sleep. A woman’s marriage again to someone she knows symbolizes her engagement to a man of high standing and status in society, and she will have a great reputation among people as compensation for what happened to her in the past at her age. Interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream of marrying her ex-husband. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream marrying her ex-husband for the second time symbolizes her attempt to return to him. Again because of her intense love for him and her inability to bear the separation, and the woman’s marriage to her ex-husband. . The husband in a dream shows a lot of goodness that she will get in the next life and getting a suitable job improves her financial income for the better. Watching the dreamer marry her ex-husband for the second time shows that she feels that she hastened the decision to divorce in the past and wants to settle the problems between them and live a decent life with him again. . Enjoy a happy and comfortable life. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman who has sex

title: Interpretation of a dream about stars by Ibn Sirin: Seeing the stars of the Pleiades in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about bright starsInterpretation of a dream about stars moving in the skyStarsSeeing stars in a dream for a girlInterpretation of a dream about falling starsInterpretation of a dream about seeing stars in the sky for a single womanInterpretation of seeing stars shining in the sky in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing stars during the dayHe sees the stars falling on the ground or sea, or burning them with fire, or collecting them with birds, It indicates death among people, or murder. If you have stars, this indicates that you will become a mufti or judge. If the stars fall on your head and you get sick, this indicates that you will die. If the stars fall on the absent person, they will return to you. And if it falls on a pregnant woman, she will give birth to a boy. Interpretation of seeing stars in a dream: The translator Ibn Sirin says: Seeing stars falling from the sky in a place known to the fortuneteller, means that that place will be afflicted with a fatal disease or death in his family, and if they fall into the sea, it is death for travelers. In a large boat or the sea, it rages and kills many people, because seeing it fall and burn people, because it is a contagious disease that spreads in the place where it fell, but if it fell in a place that the fortuneteller does not know and people were not injured, it indicates that people are about to die for People and the anguish of life, but after that there will be no relief except with a small loss. As for the one who dreams that he has the stars, or that they become his, or that he puts them in his pocket or on his lap, then his appreciation and honor will rise among men. The common people, learning the sciences of astronomy and astrology or astrology and magic. And if a person sees stars in his house or home lighting or shining in it, then he will come out of anxiety or happiness and happiness that enters that house, in the meeting of officials and people for a misfortune in the house or at his funeral. When one sees the stars falling on his head in his dream, he falls ill and dies from this disease, and if people have money asking him and he cannot pay it, he will be in distress or imprisonment. If he is in his country, then he is afflicted with distress or illness, and the falling of the star on the pregnant woman’s head indicates that she is carrying a boy in her womb and giving birth to him in good health and in good health. Relationships and a decent life between people and his family. The death of a pregnant woman or her newborn. And in the case of a vision that he is lost and guided in his path by the stars to reach his path, then it is guidance in his religion and the uprightness of his command by following the Sunnahs of his Prophet. But whoever transforms his form or body into a bright star that radiates light or flies in his body like the stars in the sky, he will obtain an increase in his glory and prestige and can reach a place where people know him, benefit from him, and guide him. And holding the stars or placing them in the hand. Whoever holds the stars and swallows one or more of them is a person with filthy morals who offends those who are more honorable than him among the companions and believers. He works, and whoever steals one or more stars, then steals from the master or someone who has a position that is dangerous, or steals public money that harms many people in order to benefit from it alone. Interpretation of a dream about stars in a dream YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing graves in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing graves dug in a dream or a dream through the vision website Roy2a.com and seeing graves being dug indicates hypocrisy and betrayal, and if one of the scholars indicates that he will follow his inheritance and if its owner shows a wealth of prestige and money, then a grave indicates imprisonment and imprisonment. In this article we will explain the interpretation of seeing digging Graves in a dream for an unmarried young man, a married man, and a woman, whether single, married, pregnant, or widowed, as well as for a divorced woman, by presenting the interpretations of the leading imams of interpretation of visions and dreams, such as the example of Imam Muhammad bin Shirin, ancient and modern. Follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of the vision of digging graves? In a dream by Ibn Sirin: A vision of building a grave in a dream indicates building a house or buying a new house. Seeing him inhabiting a grave in a man’s dream indicates imprisonment or imprisonment and may indicate a large number of debts and fears. A vision of building a grave in a dream for an unmarried young man indicates the approach of his marriage. Yourself standing in front of a grave in a dream. It indicates committing a sin. Seeing an unknown grave indicates a large number of hypocrites around the fortuneteller. Seeing a grave in a dream indicates longevity. See also: A written request to visit graves. What is the interpretation of a dream about digging graves for a married woman: Seeing a grave in a dream for a married woman indicates many things. Marital problems and disputes. Seeing a married woman digging a grave to search for something in a dream indicates the satisfaction of needs and the satisfaction of desires, if he finds what he was looking for. If he sees a married woman digging the grave of a scholar, it indicates the possibility of tracking, knowledge, and wisdom, even if the owner of the money indicates prestige and wealth. The vision Being buried alive in a grave announces their grief, grief, and illness. See also: Interpretation of seeing a grave opened in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about digging graves for an unmarried woman: Seeing the grave of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, being exhumed in a dream for unmarried women indicates his following the Sunnah, his righteousness, and his piety. Seeing a grave in a dream for a single woman indicates Anxiety, anxiety and mental disorders. Seeing digging an infidel grave in a dream for unmarried women announces transgressions, sins and errors. If an unmarried woman sees herself sitting on a rock, it shows that she is waiting for the groom and that she will get married soon. If a woman sees a lot of rocks, it indicates the abundance of goodness in her life and the burden of heavy responsibilities. See also: Interpretation of seeing a grave in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of digging graves for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees a grave in a dream, it indicates the tension and anxiety in which the pregnant woman lives. Dreaming of digging the grave of a scholar or a prominent man in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the death of problems and worries and birth. A healthy child. What is the interpretation of a dream about digging graves for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees that she is visiting graves, this indicates preaching and a return to God, and may indicate the passage of psychological crises. Seeing a grave in a dream for a divorced woman indicates bad news, sadness, and anxiety. If a divorced woman sees the grave of the Messenger of God, this indicates A good state of the situation and the disappearance of worry and anxiety, as it indicates observance of the Sunnah of the Prophet. Seeing digging a grave indicates deception and deception. See also: Interpretation of seeing the soul ascending in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about an open grave? Seeing a grave
